info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 31 at 5:53AM CDT until March 31 at 6:45AM CDT by NWS New Orleans LA
info.description:
TORLIX
The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a
* Tornado Warning for... Northeastern St. Helena Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southern Amite County in southern Mississippi...
* Until 645 AM CDT.
* At 553 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms capable of producing both tornadoes and straight line wind damage were located near Centreville, or 10 miles southwest of Liberty, moving east at 35 mph.
HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail.
SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.
IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely.
* This dangerous storm will be near... Gillsburg around 620 AM CDT.
info.instruction:
TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
Heavy rainfall may hide this tornado. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
This cluster of thunderstorms is capable of producing tornadoes and widespread significant wind damage. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

parameter.value: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 6:45 AM CDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: TORNADO WARNING in this area until 6:45 AM CDT. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Check media.

parameter.value: SNM:AVISO DE TORNADO hasta las 6:45 AM CDT. Refugiese ahora. Consulte medios informativos

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORNADO en efecto hasta las 6:45 AM CDT. Busque refugio ahora en un sotano o en el interior de un cuarto en el nivel mas bajo de un edificio seguro. Si esta al aire libre, en una casa movil, o en un vehiculo, debe ir al edificio seguro mas cercano y protegerse de proyectiles. Consulte los medios informativos.
